verses.roman:
madhye madhye āsibā kabhu āmāra daraśane
śīghra kari' punaḥ tāhāṅ karaha gamane

synonyms: madhye madhye—at intervals; āsibā—you will come; kabhu—sometimes; āmāra daraśane—to see Me; śīghra kari'-very soon; punaḥ—again; tāhāṅ—there; karaha gamane—arrange to go.
translation: "At intervals you may come see Me here and then soon again go there.
